title: Bug 4971: Strange 'copy package'
description: Bug 4971: Strange 'copy package' 2031. org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui in jdt.ui3. Select xxx as destination5.
OB: When performing a 'copy package' operation in org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui within jdt.ui3, the resulting package 'xx' contains a package named 'ui'.
EB: The 'copy package' operation should not create a package named 'ui' within the destination package 'xx'.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui in jdt.ui3. 
2. Perform a 'copy package' operation. 
3. Select 'xxx' as the destination package. 
4. Observe that the resulting 'xx' package contains a package named 'ui'.
